projects.title: Metabolites
projects.description: This was part of my earliest project which I wrote while learning NextJs. I developed this website to help my fellow coursemates learn more about the school department.

projects.title: R News
projects.description: R News is a project I built to save the stress of reading news from multiple sites. So I scraped the news using another approach 'News Feed'. Yes, I made use of Feed Parser-Library made with Python for Pythonistas to scrape news from news feeds. Currently, there are just three news feeds. I hope to add more.

projects.title: M Movies
projects.description: This is a project built to solve my movies .

projects.title: IExpense
projects.description: IExpense is a project I built to solve my expense tracking problem. It encompasses some great features, which include tracking, updating, and creating an expense portfolio. It is also mobile-friendly. It's a react application running of Django Backend.

projects.title: Pizza
projects.description: Pizza is a project built a few months ago. I developed with exploration of Django in mind, mainly with backend functionality in mind. Main features include adding and removing items from and to the cart, creating Order. Also, I added user authentication to prevent CSRF attacks. Deployment with Heroku

projects.title: Wifibase Landing Page
projects.description: Built with NextJs and styled with Chakra UI. It contains Home, About, Services, Register & Login views. I created this project to help clients and customers learn more about the company and all it entails.
